places.name: Desk
places.description: I'm sitting at my messy desk, at a glance, there are approximately five empty AllPress coffee cups that need to be thrown out.
places.descriptionSouth: Behind me is the ChainFinancial team area, currently mysteriously empty...

places.name: ChainFinancial Area
places.description: I'm standing in the ChainFinancial space of our the office, interestingly there doesn't appear to be anybody around, last time I checked the office was full? Strange...

items.name: Coffee Cup
items.description: A brown and black AllPress coffee cup from the cafe across the road
